name: Treasure Hunter XXL
description:
________________________PLAY IN FULLSCREEN ;) !

Treasure Hunter XXL is an arcade game inspired by the simplicity of old classics, but revitalized by the technology of newer times. Immerse yourself in a dense exotic underwater atmosphere and hunt for treasures in sunken ruins. Watch out for underwater mines and obstacles.

The controls are simple and explained in the game itself. Use WS or Arrow up and down to avoid obstacles. Use AD or the other arrow keys to accelerate or brake. You control a submarine that has a magnet attached to it, which you can align using the spacebar to attract coins or repel mines.

The game was created as part of the 18th Score Space Game Jam and is a joint effort between Alios, Sapient and Comic and Sons.

Music and SFX: Alios

Game Design: Alios, Sapient and Comic and Sons

Testing: Sapient

Coding: Comic and Sons

Art: Comic and Sons
